Wow. Okay, I was a bit skeptical, but I have to admit that these clouds are the icing on the cake. You never knew you missed them until you see them. The effect of warping is really lovely too.

Not too sure about city lights without cities, but hey. Can't complain.

Yo rbray, having some big issues with saving. I dunno if it's just me, but it's impossible to edit the radius in a comfortable way. I can't adjust the settings, save, then it change. I have to either edit it through the configs, or just guess, then revert to save. Sometimes it doesn't even save. All the other settings are fine but the radius. Sometime i even have to restart the whole game.

Well I felt the hd 8k clouds were a bit too much, so I found a different greyscale image with less clouds, and made it into a transparent 8k texture (it replaces kerbin2, though it can be renamed).

http://www./download/hmiat2ps356twat/kerbin2.png

Problem is, the image quality was not as expected. It turned out a bit worse than I imagined from up close. Guess that explains the small 11mb size. However, it looks perfectly fine from far away. But I'm not so good with these things, so for reference, here's the greyscale, if anyone can make a better one:

http://naturalearth.springercarto.com/ne3_data/8192/clouds/fair_clouds_8k.jpg
installed the mod for the first time, it really adds a nice touch to the game, very strange its not in stock yet, didn't notice any framedrops.
